A-1 Pictures.name: 株式会社A-1 Pictures
A-1 Pictures.description: A-1 Pictures Inc. (Japanese: 株式会社A-1 Pictures) is a Japanese animation studio founded by ex-Sunrise producer Mikihiro Iwata, a subsidiary of Sony Music Entertainment Japan's anime production firm Aniplex.

AIC.name: Anime International Company
AIC.description: Anime International Company, Inc. (Japanese: 株式会社アニメインターナショナルカンパニー), often abbreviated as AIC, is a Japanese animation studio with headquarters in Nerima, Tokyo, Japan.

J.C.Staff.name: J.C.Staff Co., Ltd.
J.C.Staff.description: J.C.Staff Co., Ltd. (Japanese: 株式会社ジェー・シー・スタッフ, J and C stand for Japan Creative), is a Japanese animation studio founded in January 1986 by Tomoyuki Miyata. The studio's first release was Yōtōden in 1987.

top.title: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka

Madhouse.name: Madhouse Inc.
Madhouse.description: Madhouse Inc. (Japanese: 株式会社マッドハウス, stylized as MADHOUSE) is a Japanese animation studio founded in 1972 by ex–Mushi Pro animators, including Masao Maruyama, Osamu Dezaki, Rintaro and Yoshiaki Kawajiri.

Production I.G.name: Production I.G
Production I.G.description: Production I.G, Inc. (Japanese: 株式会社プロダクション・アイジー) is a Japanese anime studio and production enterprise. Production I.G has been involved in the creation of numerous anime television series, OVAs, theatrical films, and is further involved in video game design and development, as well as music publishing and management

Studio Deen.name: Studio DEEN
Studio Deen.description: Studio Deen Co. Ltd. (Japanese: 株式会社スタジオディーン, sometimes stylized as Studio DEEN) is a Japanese animation studio founded in 1975 by Sunrise producer Hiroshi Hasegawa and ex-Sunrise animators.

top.title: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!

Studio Pierrot.name: Pierrot Co., Ltd.
Studio Pierrot.description: Pierrot Co., Ltd. (株式会社ぴえろ, Kabushiki-gaisha Piero) is a Japanese animation studio established in May 1979 by former employees of Tatsunoko Production and Mushi Production. Its headquarters are located in Mitaka, Tokyo.

Sunrise.name: Sunrise Inc.
Sunrise.description: Sunrise Inc. (株式会社サンライズ, Kabushiki gaisha Sanraizu) is a Japanese animation studio and production company which is a subsidiary of Bandai Namco Holdings. Its former name was Nippon Sunrise and, before that, Sunrise Studio.

TMS Entertainment.name: TMS Entertainment Co., Ltd.
TMS Entertainment.description: TMS Entertainment Co., Ltd. (株式会社トムス・エンタテインメント), formerly known as Tokyo Movie Shinsha (東京ムービー新社 Tōkyō Mūbī Shinsha), is a Japanese animation studio founded in 1946. TMS is one of the oldest and most famous anime studios in Japan.

Toei Animation.name: Toei Animation Co. Ltd.
Toei Animation.description: Toei Animation Co., Ltd. (東映アニメーション株式会社, Tōei Animēshon Kabushiki-gaisha), commonly referred to as Toei Animation, is a Japanese animation studio primarily controlled by its namesake Toei Company.

top.title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
